name: Magic Wand (1st-Level Spell)
desc: This baton is about a foot long and contains a single spell. The appearance typically relates to the spell within.

name: Wand of Widening (1st-Level Spell)
desc: The end of this wand is forked instead of tapered
craftingRequirement: Supply a casting of a spell of the appropriate level. The spell must have a casting time of one action or two actions, can't have a duration, and must have an area of burst (10 feet or more), cone, or line.
effect: You Cast the Spell, and increase its area. Add 5 feet to the radius of a burst that normally has a radius of at least 10 feet; add 5 feet to the length of a cone or line that is normally 15 feet long or smaller; or add 10 feet to the length of a larger cone or line.
frequency: once per day, plus overcharge; This activation takes two actions if the spell normally takes one action to cast, or three actions if the spell normally takes two actions

name: Wand of Widening (2nd-Level Spell)

frequency: once per day, plus overcharge; This activation takes two actions if the spell normally takes one action to cast, or three actions if the spell normally takes two actions

name: Magic Wand (3rd-Level Spell)
desc: This baton is about a foot long and contains a single spell. The appearance typically relates to the spell within.

name: Wand of Smoldering Fireballs (3rd-Level Spell)
desc: This blackened, heavily burned stick smells faintly of bat guano.
craftingRequirement: Supply a casting of fireball of the appropriate level.
effect: You cast fireball of the indicated level. Each creature that fails its save takes |dice=1d6 Persistent Fire| persistent fire damage.

name: Wand of Widening (3rd-Level Spell)
